description: Gets details about a namespace. For more information, see Table namespaces in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide. You must have the s3tables:GetNamespace permission to use this operation.

parameters.name: tableBucketARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the namespace was created at.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that created the namespace.

nested_items.name: ownerAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that owns the namespcace.

nested_items.name: namespaceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the namespace.

nested_items.name: tableBucketId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the table bucket containing this namespace.
